pages.text: The Carbon Fiber Strain$(br2)Base THC: 24% $(br)Base CBD: 1% $(br)Effect: Vein High
Carbon Fiber Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Carbon Fiber Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Carbon Fiber Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Carbon Fiber Weed in an Extractor
You can package your carbon fiber weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
